Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hello, I signed up for an ad account through a link from Clickbank.  I was supposed to get a $500 ad credit, where does that show up?

Hi Corey, thanks for reaching out! To redeem your ad credit, you need to create an account on NewsBreak and follow the steps outlined in our guide. Once you've created your account and set up your billing, the ad credit should be visible in your account under the Prepay option. For detailed instructions, please refer to this article: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any issues or need further assistance, feel free to let me know!
You're welcome, Corey! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
Ok, I added billing method.  I don't see a prepay option.

Hi Corey, it sounds like you might be using the Autopay option instead of Prepay. If you want to switch to Prepay, you can add credits to your account manually. Unfortunately, once you've uploaded your primary payment method, you can't remove it but can update it with another card. For more details on billing options and how they work, please check out our [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide). If you're still having trouble or need further assistance, please let me know!
No, I am trying to redeem a $500 ad credit on my account after using the clickbank link to sign up.

Got it, Corey. To redeem your $500 ad credit, please follow these steps:
1. Access the Billing Section in your NewsBreak Ad Manager account.
2. Under Ad Credits, click on ‘Add ad credits.’
3. Select the amount of ad credits you would like to purchase (in this case, it should show your $500 credit).
4. Provide any required information and confirm.
If you still don't see the $500 ad credit, please contact our support team for further assistance. You can refer to this article for more details: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit).
Looks like you missed a step, I have to submit a support ticket first in order to apply for the ad credits feature

Thanks for pointing that out, Corey. You're right. To apply for the ad credits feature, you need to submit a support ticket first. Here's what you need to do:
1. Submit a support request through the NewsBreak Help Center.
2. Once your request is approved, you'll be able to see and redeem your $500 ad credit in the Billing Section of your account.
For more detailed instructions, please refer to this article: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you need any further assistance, feel free to let me know!
where do I get the postback url

You can find the Postback URL in the NewsBreak Event Manager. If you need specific instructions for integrating with a particular platform, please let me know which one you're using (e.g., ClickBank, Cake, Voluum), and I can provide more detailed guidance.
